original_text: And they shall fill thy houses, and the houses of all thy servants, and the houses of all the Egyptians; which neither thy fathers, nor thy fathers' fathers have seen, since the day that they were upon the earth unto this day. And he turned himself, and went out from Pharaoh.
korean_text: 또 네 집들과 네 모든 신하의 집들과 모든 애굽 사람의 집들에 가득하리니 이는 네 아버지와 네 조상이 이 땅에 있었던 그 날로부터 오늘까지 보지 못하였던 것이리라 하셨다 하고 돌이켜 바로에게서 나오니

sentences.original_text: And they shall fill thy houses
and the houses of all thy servants
sentences.korean_translation: 네 모든 종들의 집도 채울 것이요

sentences.original_text: and the houses of all the Egyptians
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 애굽 사람들의 집도 채울 것이라

sentences.original_text: nor thy fathers' fathers have seen
since the day that they were upon the earth
